message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $10,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  This is a very competitive price for a product of this value.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $10,750? I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget.
